title: <figure>
description: The `<figure>` HTML element represents self-contained content, such as images, illustrations, diagrams, code snippets or videos, with an optional caption provided by the `<figcaption>` element.
content: The element that represents self-contained content, such as an image with an optional caption, code snippet or diagram. It's used to group media and its associated text, allowing for more flexible placement and styling.
